courses.title: Communication (Core)
courses.prerequisite: Satisfactory scores on English portion of ACT test and TSI examination or ENGL 0301. For ENGL 1302, a grade of 'C' or better in ENGL 1301.
courses.notes: See Core Curriculum for details. Option: ENGL 1301.

courses.title: Calculus I
courses.prerequisite: MATH 2412 with a grade of 'C' or better; or passing the Precalculus Exemption Test administered by the Department of Mathematics.

courses.title: Introduction to Electrical and Computer Engineering
Integrative and Experiential Learning (Core)
courses.notes: Complete three credit hours from the approved area, except PHIL 2326, in addition to three science labs.

courses.title: 1301 Learning Framework; 1101 Academic and Career Success; 1001 Living and Working by Design
courses.notes: As required, based on credit hours earned, TSI status, High School rank, major declaration.

courses.title: Communication (Core)
courses.prerequisite: Satisfactory scores on English portion of ACT test and TSI examination or ENGL 0301. For ENGL 1302, a grade of 'C' or better in ENGL 1301.
courses.notes: See Core Curriculum for details. Options: ENGL 1302 or ENGL 1305.

courses.title: Calculus II
courses.prerequisite: MATH 2413 with a grade of 'C' or better.

courses.title: Computer Science I
courses.prerequisite: Grade 'C' or better in any of the following; MATH 1314, MATH 1414 or placement in a higher level Math courses (MATH 2412, MATH 2413) and credit for or concurrent enrollment in CSCI 1101 or CMPE 1101 or EECE 1101.

courses.title: Physics for Scientists and Engineers I
courses.prerequisite: MATH 2413.
courses.notes: 1 hour (lab) applied to Core 090. See Core Curriculum for details.

courses.title: Mathematics for Electrical and Computer Engineers
courses.prerequisite: CSCI 1381 or CMPE 1170/1370 (or CMPE 1378/1178) or CSCI 1470 with a grade of 'C' or better, and MATH 2413 (or MATH 2487) with a grade of 'C' or better.

courses.title: Practicum of Mathematics for Electrical and Computer Engineering
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better or registration in Math 2346.

courses.title: Computer Science II
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in: CSCI 1470 or CSCI 1390 or [ [CSCI 1370 or CMPE 1370] and [CSCI 1170 or CMPE 1170] ].

courses.title: Social and Behavioral Sciences (Core)
courses.notes: See Core Curriculum for course options.

courses.title: American History (Core)
courses.notes: See Core Curriculum. Options: HIST 1301 or HIST 2327.

courses.title: Digital Systems Engineering I
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better or registration in CMPE 1101 or ELEE 1101 or CSCI 1101 or EECE 1101.

courses.title: Digital Systems Engineering I Lab
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better or registration in [CMPE 2330 or ELEE 2330 or EECE 2306].

courses.title: Algorithms and Data Structures
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in: [CSCI 3310 or MATH 2346 or MATH 2305] and [CSCI 2380 or CMPE 2380].

courses.title: Physics for Scientists and Engineers II
courses.prerequisite: PHYS 2425 and MATH 2414.
courses.notes: 1 hour (lab) applied to Core 090. See Core Curriculum for details.

courses.title: Electric Circuits I
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in MATH 2414 and [CMPE 1101 or ELEE 1101 or EECE 1101] and a grade of C or better or registration in PHYS 2426.

courses.title: Electric Circuits I Lab
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better or registration in [CMPE 2320 or ELEE 2305 or EECE 2305].

courses.title: Chemistry for Engineers
courses.prerequisite: Minimum grade of C is required in one of the following courses: MATH 1314, MATH 1414, MATH 2412, MATH 2413 or MATH 2487.

courses.title: Chemistry for Engineers Lab
courses.prerequisite: Credit/registration in CHEM 1309.

courses.title: Software Engineering I
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in: [3 advanced hours in CSCI or CMPE or EECE] and [CSCI 2380 or CMPE 2380].

courses.title: Microprocessor Systems
courses.prerequisite: Grade of 'C' or better in [ELEE 2330 or CMPE 2330 or EECE 2306] and [CSCI 1370 or CSCI 1380 or CSCI 1387 or CSCI 1470].

courses.title: Differential Equations
courses.prerequisite: MATH 2414 (or MATH 2488) with a grade of 'C' or better.

courses.title: Systems Programming
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in: [CSCI 2380 or CMPE 2380] and [CSCI 2333 or CMPE 2333 or ELEE 3435 or CMPE 3437 or EECE 3435].

courses.title: Electronics I
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in [CMPE 2320 or ELEE 2305 or EECE 2305] and [CMPE 2120 or ELEE 2105 or EECE 2105].

courses.title: Microcontroller and Embedded Systems Lab
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in [CMPE 3437 or ELEE 3435 or EECE 3435] or CSCI 2333 or CMPE 2333.

courses.title: Prescribed Elective from Approved List
courses.prerequisite: Prerequisites differ between course options.
courses.notes: Options: EECE 3225, EECE 3321, EECE 4375, EECE 4390, [only one from CSCI 3326, CSCI 3328, or CSCI 3329], CSCI 3341, or CSCI 4333.

courses.notes: Options: EECE 3225, EECE 3321, EECE 4375, EECE 4390, [only one from CSCI 3326, CSCI 3328, or CSCI 3329], CSCI 3341, or CSCI 4333.

courses.title: Probability and Statistics for Electrical and Computer Engineers
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in MATH 2414.

courses.title: Digital Systems Engineering II
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in [ELEE 2330 or CMPE 2330 or EECE 2306].

courses.title: Computer Architecture
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in [ELEE 3435 or CMPE 3437 or EECE 3435 or CSCI 2333 or CMPE 2333] and [ELEE 4303 or EECE 4303 or CMPE 4303].

courses.title: American History (Core)
courses.notes: See Core Curriculum. Options: HIST 1302 or HIST 2328.

courses.title: Prescribed Elective - Advanced EECE or CSCI
courses.notes: Any EECE/CSCI 4000-level course not used to satisfy any other requirement and not equivalent or similar to any other course satisfying any requirement. Must be approved by faculty adviser.

courses.title: Prescribed Elective from Approved List
courses.prerequisite: Prerequisites differ between course options.
courses.notes: Options: EECE 3225, EECE 3321, EECE 4375, EECE 4390, [only one from CSCI 3326, CSCI 3328, or CSCI 3329], CSCI 3341, or CSCI 4333.

courses.title: Senior Design I
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in [ELEE 3435 or CMPE 3437 or EECE 3435 or CSCI 2333 or CMPE 2333] and [CMPE 3403 or ELEE 3301 or EECE 3301] and [STAT 3337 or CMPE 3343 or ELEE 3340 or EECE 3340 or EECE 3230 or ELEE 3230] and [CMPE 3340 or CSCI 3340 or EECE 3230 or ELEE 3230] and [having finished with a grade of C or better or be enrolled in at least 6 credits of 4000-level EECE coursework].

courses.title: Creative Arts (Core)
courses.notes: See Core Curriculum for course options.

courses.prerequisite: Prerequisites differ between course options.
courses.notes: Options: EECE 3225, EECE 3321, EECE 4375, EECE 4390, [only one from CSCI 3326, CSCI 3328, or CSCI 3329], CSCI 3341, or CSCI 4333.

courses.title: Operating Systems
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in: [CSCI 2380 or CMPE 2380] and [CSCI 2333 or CMPE 2333 or ELEE 3435 or CMPE 3437 or EECE 3435].

courses.title: Prescribed Elective - Advanced EECE or CSCI
courses.notes: Any EECE/CSCI 4000-level course not used to satisfy any other requirement and not equivalent or similar to any other course satisfying any requirement. Must be approved by faculty adviser.

courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in [EECE 4361 or ELEE 4361] or CMPE 4371 or CMPE 4373.
